trans-unit.source: Provides qualifying information to a callback method when a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject.ObjectChanged"></xref> event occurs.
PeerObjects are run-time data items associated with an application, such as certificates, pictures, avatars, or specific descriptions.
They may also be referred to as a host peer's registered applications, objects and presence information.
When a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject> is changed, an event is raised.
Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration> session begins.

Gets the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerChangeType"></xref> that specifies the type of change that has occurred to a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>.
Unless specified, the default value for this property is `null`.
<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerChangeType"></xref> that specifies the type of change that has occurred.

Gets the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> for which object information has changed.

The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> on which <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> information has changed.
If the endpoint is not associated with a contact, `null` is returned.
Gets the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> for which object information has changed.
Unless specified, the default value for this property is `null`.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> on which <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> information has changed.
Gets the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> that has been added, deleted or updated.
Unless specified, the default value for this property is `null`.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> that has been added, deleted, or updated.
